changes.details: from app.models.equipment_template import ConsultantType, EquipmentTemplate, EquipmentTemplateConsultant

changes.description: Added three new models to __all__ exports

patterns_discovered.description: Centralized model registration in __init__.py by importing models and adding them to __all__ list
patterns_discovered.evidence: Imports from app.models submodules combined with __all__ list maintains consistent public API

patterns_discovered.description: Related models are imported together from their respective modules
patterns_discovered.evidence: All three equipment-related models (ConsultantType, EquipmentTemplate, EquipmentTemplateConsultant) imported from single equipment_template module

patterns_discovered.description: Models added at the end of existing lists maintaining consistent structure
patterns_discovered.evidence: New imports and exports appended after existing ones rather than inserted mid-list

gotchas_discovered.description: Models must be imported from their respective modules before being added to __all__
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Follow the existing pattern of import statement first, then __all__ entry

gotchas_discovered.description: The __all__ list uses trailing comma before closing bracket, important for consistency
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Maintain trailing comma convention when adding new exports

approach_outcome.description: Successfully registered three new equipment-related models in the centralized __init__.py file
approach_outcome.implementation_details: Added import statement for equipment_template module and registered all three exported classes in __all__ list

recommendations.recommendation: Consider adding docstring comments to __init__.py explaining the model groupings or module organization
recommendations.rationale: Would help new developers understand the model hierarchy and dependencies

recommendations.recommendation: Document the pattern for registering new models to ensure consistency as more models are added
recommendations.rationale: As the codebase grows, explicit documentation of the registration pattern prevents inconsistencies

recommendations.recommendation: Verify that all three newly registered models are properly accessible via the app.models namespace
recommendations.rationale: Ensures the public API exports are correctly configured and don't have circular import issues
